posts.text:
Trump wants to use funding that would make your life better as leverage to indulge his never-ending need to stroke his own ego.

If you needed anymore proof that Trump won't do anything to help Americans if it doesn't benefit him or his pocketbook, here it is:
www.politico.com/news/2026/02...

replies.displayName: James Mitchell👈Who the Phuck is this Guy?
replies.text: Article II, Section 4 establishes that the President, Vice President, and all civil officers of the United States can be removed from office through impeachment for treason, bribery, or other high crimes and misdemeanors.
So when are you going to something, anything to rein him in? Posting news links isn't action.

posts.text:
‘Ōlelo Hawai‘i is one of Hawaii's official languages, but past teaching bans and misguided policies nearly led to its extinction.

Through perseverance, Hawaii's communities have revitalized the language, but we must continue working to preserve and protect it.

E ola mau ka ʻōlelo Hawaiʻi!

posts.text:
This administration's single-minded obsession with deportation is endangering children and breaking up families.

Americans have made it clear they've had enough of this regime's chaos. We must change course. 

www.washingtonpost.com/immigration/...

replies.text:
🔥Abolish DHS & abolish ICE🔥

We’re attacked w/ continual gaslighting by the regime & fascists in power & by centrist Ds led by Schumer & Jeffries while we're being abducted, stalked, terrorized, brutalized, threatened, & murdered holding the line www.huffpost.com/entry/democr...

It’s all connected.

Agree! But you should do this: 

bsky.app/profile/forc...

So no new funding for ICE DHS?  No negotiating or compromises with Republicans on the Dems list of requirements, including masks?  Yes? 
You do see who are dealing with and who they are?

replies.displayName: James Mitchell👈Who the Phuck is this Guy?
replies.text: WE WANT REAL VISIBLE CHANGE BEFORE WE FUND A DAMN THING ANYMORE!!!
We’ve also made it clear that we don’t want a single dollar more going to DHS. We want the 75b clawed back and the org dismantled.

posts.text:
Dragging people out of their cars.
Arresting people without judicial warrants.
Killing American citizens in the street.

DHS's violent chaos cannot continue.

We need to put common sense guardrails on them NOW.

replies.text:
Just because Minnesota 
won? ICE CUTS number
Of boots on the ground. 
Imagine ICE swarming 
Waikiki. Lots of workers
For them to Terrorize. 
DISBAND ICE.
Yes!
Hello Folks . Long day. What about Murder !!                   bsky.app/profile/off-...

So you’re good with Americans being murdered as long as you provide ICE  with a list of “guardrails” for them to ignore. Good job screwing over Americans. First you helped Repubs take away our health care now your helping take away our liberties. Shame to you. Hope you’re next to be locked away.
No guardrails. Defund the Gestapo.
No. Dismantle DHS and Abolish ICE. No secret police with the ability to spy on Americans after grinding their nose in the dirt
You tell them Senator!  The behavior is worse than THUGS!
You sure talk a lot, but that hasn't accomplished anything.

Happy Black History Month!
